overview: Detective Carly Segan,( Tracy Gold), is investigating the Satanic murders of young women who all seem to have one thing in common... their time at a place called 'Safe Harbor'. Little does Joe Avery, her partner know, that she too has her own history with 'Safe Harbor'. As her past begins to unravel Carly is torn between two loyalties, should she trust her heart or trust her instincts.
title: Safe Harbor
